name: MR. FLOWERS
description:
The original piece that inspired "Mr. Flowers" was titled "HEWHOISART". It was a simple piece with the silhouette of a man with a flower for his head. Sometimes when I'm down I feel as if my head is a ticking time bomb waiting to explode. Other times , especially when I'm creating I feel as if my head is a flower, flourishing in the sunlight with no walls to stop me from growing however I need to grow.

- @IYKTYFK
